messages.content:
"There are clear choices at this election:

Between a Tory Government who want a blank cheque for a hard Brexit and more austerity - or a Labour Government which will put the interest of the whole country first and build a Britain for the many not the few.

Between the SNP using this election just to get another referendum - or a local Labour champion, who will focus on jobs, the economy and the public services we need to deliver a fairer society in Scotland."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to a hard Brexit and more austerity, support for a Labour Government focused on the country.
Focus on jobs and the economy.
Deliver the public services needed for a fairer society.

issues.brexitEurope: Between a Tory Government who want a blank cheque for a hard Brexit and more austerity.
issues.government: Between a Tory Government who want a blank cheque for a hard Brexit and more austerity - or a Labour Government which will put the interest of the whole country first and build a Britain for the many not the few.
issues.socialWelfare: Deliver the public services we need to deliver a fairer society in Scotland.
